calendar.subject: Ecosperity Schedule
calendar.description: We’re still finalizing the schedule, hence things may change a bit. Rest assured — it'll be a day to remember.

movingForward.title: Moving towards a more resilient and inclusive world
movingForward.description: The United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) have built momentum towards a more resilient and inclusive world. As the countdown to 2030 begins, there is growing consensus on the importance of public-private sector collaboration to achieve the SDGs. Businesses are starting to seize the US$12 trillion worth of opportunities in addressing our most pressing social and environmental challenges. Technology disruptions and demographic shifts will significantly change the way we learn, work and live. The time is ripe to translate our collective action into impact and tangible outcomes for our future generations.

joinUs.title: Join us as we initiate a conversation
joinUs.description: The 5th Ecosperity Conference will be held in conjunction with United Nations World Environment Day. We will explore new approaches to education, food and healthcare to achieve impact at scale and build resilient societies in an increasingly digital and urban future.

illustrations.title: Food to Nutrition
illustrations.description: Affordable access for a growing Asia

tabs.title: Ecosperity

calendar.subject: Conference schedule
calendar.description: We’re still finalising the schedule, hence things may change a bit. Rest assured — it'll be a day to remember.

notes: We’re still finalising the schedule, hence things may change a bit. Rest assured — it'll be a day to remember.

scheduleItems.title: Panel Discussion: “Food to Nutrition: Affordable Access for a Growing Asia”
scheduleItems.description: The world’s population will grow to 9.8 billion in 2050 due to population growth and urbanisation. Asia and Africa are projected to urbanise more rapidly than other regions. How can we sustainably and nutritiously feed a rapidly growing Asia?

scheduleItems.title: Panel Discussion: “Learning to Learn: Adapting to Continuous Workforce Disruption”
scheduleItems.description: Technological advancements have disrupted businesses and job roles. How can we enable continuous learning for a workforce that is also living longer?

scheduleItems.title: Panel Discussion: “Healthcare to Self-care: Empowering Healthy, Productive Lives”
scheduleItems.description: Urbanisation, demographic shifts and changing lifestyles have contributed to the growth of non–communicable diseases. With an increasingly aging population, what are the healthcare innovations and new approaches to keep people healthier for longer?

scheduleItems.title: Networking at UNLEASH Marketplace / Tour of Sustainable Solutions Expo

pastConference.title:
Past Conference
Highlights
pastConference.subTitle: Tomorrow Starts Today! Securing our Sustainable Future in Asia
pastConference.description: In 2017, our 4th Ecosperity conference explored what it means for businesses to inegrate the values of sustainability and translate these into practice. From investing responsibility to considering the nexus between security and sustainability in Asia and beyond.

programs.name: UNLEASH Innovation Lab
programs.description: A global innovation lab bringing 1,000 young talents from all over the world to work on new, innovative and disruptive solutions to achieve the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

programs.name: Stewardship Asia Roundtable
programs.description: Brings together the region's influential thinkers and leaders for a dynamic exchange of ideas on advocating sound stewardship and governance in their organisations and businesses. The theme for 2018 is "Stewardship in a Disruptive World".

programs.name: CEO Roundtable
programs.description: A dialogue between regional business leaders to ideate on how we can collaborate towards a low carbon economy future.

programs.name: Sustainable Solutions Expo
programs.description: Themed “Digitalisation and Innovation for a Low Carbon and Resilient Future”, the Expo will showcase solutions and investment opportunities in Asia with a focus on circular economy models, food and agriculture as well as digital connectivity. Organized by Global Compact Network Singapore (GCNS).

moderators.title: 2018 Speakers and Moderators
moderators.detail: Be engaged by our panel of distinguished speakers at the conference.
